medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain across the chest began before dinner last night, accompanied by nausea. Eating dinner did not help the pain and made the nausea worse. The patient was awoken off and on throughout the night by progressively worsening pain, which migrated to the right upper quadrant (RUQ) throughout the night and the next day. The patient was unable to eat during this period.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, CAD and history of MI and CABG, Prostate CA (status post XRT), urethral stricture
medical_history.family_history: Father: heart problems; Mother: Not specified
